tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE natural_disasters_areas (
	disaster_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	disaster_type VARCHAR,
	location GEOMETRY(POINT),
	disaster_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE natural_disaster_areas (
    area_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    affected_image BYTEA NOT NULL,
    disaster_type TEXT,
    affected_region GEOMETRY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE disaster_reports (
    report_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    report_date DATE NOT NULL,
    area_id INT REFERENCES natural_disaster_areas(area_id),
    report_description TEXT,
    report_image BYTEA
);

CREATE TABLE rescue_teams (
    team_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    team_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    deployed_date DATE,
    area_id INT REFERENCES natural_disaster_areas(area_id),
    team_capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE areas_affected (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name VARCHAR(50),
    longitude FLOAT,
    latitude FLOAT,
    disaster_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE image_analysis (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    image_id INT,
    area_id INT,
    analyzed_date TIMESTAMP,
    analyzed_by VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE NaturalDisasters (
    disaster_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    disaster_name STRING NOT NULL,
    disaster_type STRING NOT NULL,
    disaster_date DATE NOT NULL,
    affected_area_id UUID REFERENCES AffectedAreas(area_id)
);
